beta.description.1.message: **PreMiD Beta** is now available for everyone!

beta.description.2.message: What will you get if you sign up?

beta.features.2.message: Access to PreMiD's super secret text channels

beta.features.3.message: A special role on our Discord server

beta.register.text.message: Ready for it? Join {0} other Beta Testers!
beta.register.text.description: {0} will be replaced with the beta testers count -> is a variable

thankyou.title.message: Cool! You are now a beta user!

thankyou.description.message: Our monkeys are working on getting you into our beta program as fast as possible. Thank you for registering!

error.noslots.message: Looks like we don't have any more beta slots available.
error.noslots.description: Shows when the beta slots are full.
